string-array.name: create_table_queries
string-array.item: "CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `listOfSchools` ( `schoolId` int(11) NOT NULL, `schoolName` varchar(256), `schoolType` varchar(256), `feeCurrency` varchar(50), `schoolAdd` varchar(256), `schoolAddCity` varchar(256), `schoolAddCountry` varchar(256), `schoolEmail` varchar(256) DEFAULT NULL, `schoolPhone` varchar(256) DEFAULT NULL, `principalName` varchar(256) DEFAULT NULL, `principalPhone` varchar(256) DEFAULT NULL, `openingTime` varchar(100), `closingTime` varchar(100) DEFAULT NULL, `isActive` tinyint(1) NOT NULL DEFAULT '1', PRIMARY KEY (`schoolId`))"
